# Advanced R Interactive Solutions

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This is the repository for my version of Advanced R Solutions. Here I provide my solutions to the questions in the [Advanced R (2nd edition) book](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/) in my coding style. The code cells are also interactive where appropriate!


# Reproducibility

- Make sure Quarto is installed.
- Render this book with the following command:
```
quarto render quarto
```
